description: Schema for submitting an RNAi stably or transiently transfected.
title: RNAi vector

___target.description: The name of the gene whose expression or product is modified by the RNAi construct.
___target.title: Target

___url.description: An external resource with additional information about the RNAi construct.
___url.title: URL

___vector_backbone_name.description: The name of the vector backbone used for the construct.
___vector_backbone_name.title: Backbone name

___rnai_target_sequence.description: Genomic sequence targeted by the RNA.
___rnai_target_sequence.title: Target sequence

___rnai_type.description: The classification of the interfering RNA (e.g. shRNA or siRNA).
___rnai_type.title: Class
